text: The 470s was the decade that began on January 1, 470. and ended on December 31, 479. It is distinct from the decade known as the 48th which began on January 1, 471 and ended on December 31, 480. ==Events== * 476 â€“ The last Western Roman Emperor in Rome was removed by Odoacer the Ostrogoth. * Peter the Fuller is restored as Patriarch of Antioch.
title: 470s
